flawed_nl_solution:
2000 x 0.25 = <<2000*0.25=500>>500
The loser got 45% of the votes because 100 - 55 = <<100-55=45>>45
The winner got 725 votes because 500 x 0.55 = <<500*0.55=725>>725
The loser got 225 votes because 500 x 0.45 = <<500*0.45=225>>225
The winner got 500 more votes because 725 - 225 = <<725-225=500>>500
#### 500

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 275, not 725. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
